categories.name: SAST
categories.description: Static Application Security Testing - Analyze source code for security vulnerabilities

categories.name: DAST
categories.description: Dynamic Application Security Testing - Test running applications for security issues

categories.name: SCA
categories.description: Software Composition Analysis - Find vulnerabilities in open source dependencies

categories.name: Secrets Management
categories.description: Detect and manage secrets, credentials, and sensitive data

categories.name: Container Security
categories.description: Secure container images and runtime environments

categories.name: SBOM
categories.description: Software Bill of Materials generation and management

categories.name: Policy as Code
categories.description: Define and enforce security policies as code

categories.name: Security Observability
categories.description: Monitor and detect security threats in real-time

tools.name: SonarQube
tools.description: Comprehensive static code analysis for code quality and security vulnerabilities
tools.longDescription: SonarQube is a self-managed, automatic code review tool that systematically helps you deliver Clean Code. It integrates with your existing workflow and detects issues in your code across 29 languages.

tools.name: Semgrep
tools.description: Lightweight static analysis for many languages. Find bugs and enforce standards
tools.longDescription: Semgrep is a fast, open-source, static analysis engine for finding bugs, detecting vulnerabilities, and enforcing code standards. Its rules look like the code you already write.

tools.name: CodeQL
tools.description: Semantic code analysis engine for finding security vulnerabilities
tools.longDescription: CodeQL is the analysis engine used by GitHub to detect security vulnerabilities and errors in code. It lets you query code as if it were data.

tools.name: Trivy
tools.description: Comprehensive security scanner for containers, Kubernetes, and IaC
tools.longDescription: Trivy is the most popular open source security scanner, reliable, fast, and easy to use. It detects vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, secrets, and SBOMs in containers, Kubernetes, and more.

tools.name: OWASP ZAP
tools.description: Free, open-source DAST tool for finding vulnerabilities in web applications
tools.longDescription: The OWASP Zed Attack Proxy (ZAP) is one of the world's most popular free security tools. It helps you automatically find security vulnerabilities in your web applications.

tools.name: Snyk
tools.description: Find and fix vulnerabilities in open source dependencies and containers
tools.longDescription: Snyk is a developer security platform that helps you find, prioritize, and fix security vulnerabilities in your code, open source dependencies, containers, and infrastructure as code.

tools.name: GitLeaks
tools.description: Find secrets and credentials in git repos, files, and directories
tools.longDescription: GitLeaks is a SAST tool for detecting and preventing hardcoded secrets like passwords, api keys, and tokens in git repos.

tools.name: HashiCorp Vault
tools.description: Manage secrets, protect sensitive data, and enable zero-trust security
tools.longDescription: Vault is a tool for securely accessing secrets. A secret is anything that you want to tightly control access to, such as API keys, passwords, or certificates.

tools.name: Checkov
tools.description: Static code analysis tool for infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
tools.longDescription: Checkov is a static code analysis tool for infrastructure-as-code. It scans cloud infrastructure provisioned using Terraform, Cloudformation, Kubernetes, Helm, ARM Templates, and Serverless.

tools.name: tfsec
tools.description: Security scanner for Terraform code
tools.longDescription: tfsec uses static analysis of your Terraform templates to spot potential security issues before deployment.

tools.name: Grype
tools.description: Vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems
tools.longDescription: Grype is a vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems. It works with Syft, the SBOM generator, to provide vulnerability scanning.

tools.name: Falco
tools.description: Cloud-native runtime security tool for Linux containers and Kubernetes
tools.longDescription: Falco, the cloud-native runtime security project, is the de facto standard for runtime security. It detects unexpected application behavior and alerts on threats at runtime.

tools.name: Terrascan
tools.description: Detect compliance and security violations across IaC
tools.longDescription: Terrascan is a static code analyzer for Infrastructure as Code that detects compliance and security violations to mitigate risk before provisioning cloud native resources.

tools.name: Syft
tools.description: Generate SBOM (Software Bill of Materials) for container images and filesystems
tools.longDescription: Syft is a CLI tool and Go library for generating a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from container images and filesystems.

tools.name: Open Policy Agent (OPA)
tools.description: Policy-based control for cloud native environments
tools.longDescription: Open Policy Agent (OPA) is an open source, general-purpose policy engine that enables unified, context-aware policy enforcement across the entire stack.

tools.name: Kyverno
tools.description: Kubernetes native policy management
tools.longDescription: Kyverno is a policy engine designed for Kubernetes. It can validate, mutate, and generate configurations with admission controls.

tools.name: Prowler
tools.description: AWS security assessment and hardening tool
tools.longDescription: Prowler is a security tool to perform AWS security best practices assessments, audits, incident response, continuous monitoring, hardening and forensics readiness.

tools.name: ScoutSuite
tools.description: Multi-cloud security posture assessment tool
tools.longDescription: Scout Suite is an open source multi-cloud security-auditing tool, which enables security posture assessment of cloud environments.

tools.name: Nuclei
tools.description: Fast vulnerability scanner based on templates
tools.longDescription: Nuclei is a fast, customizable vulnerability scanner powered by the global community and written in Go. It uses templates to scan for vulnerabilities across protocols.

tools.name: Bandit
tools.description: Security linter for Python code
tools.longDescription: Bandit is a tool designed to find common security issues in Python code. It processes each file, builds an AST, and runs appropriate plugins.

tools.name: TruffleHog
tools.description: Find credentials and secrets in git history
tools.longDescription: TruffleHog is a tool that finds secrets and credentials in git repositories, files, and directories. It scans entire git history.

tools.name: OWASP Dependency-Check
tools.description: Software Composition Analysis for finding vulnerable dependencies
tools.longDescription: OWASP Dependency-Check is a Software Composition Analysis (SCA) tool that detects publicly disclosed vulnerabilities in application dependencies.

tools.name: Conftest
tools.description: Write tests against structured configuration data
tools.longDescription: Conftest helps you write tests against structured configuration data. Using Conftest you can write tests for your Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, and other configuration files.

tools.name: KICS
tools.description: Infrastructure as Code security scanner
tools.longDescription: KICS (Keeping Infrastructure as Code Secure) is an open-source solution for static code analysis of IaC.

tools.name: Clair
tools.description: Vulnerability Static Analysis for Containers
tools.longDescription: Clair is an API-driven analysis engine that inspects containers for vulnerabilities. It's designed to be integrated into larger systems.

tools.name: Hadolint
tools.description: Dockerfile linter for best practices
tools.longDescription: Hadolint is a smarter Dockerfile linter that helps you build best practice Docker images. It checks Dockerfiles for common mistakes and security issues.

tools.name: Brakeman
tools.description: Static analysis security scanner for Ruby on Rails
tools.longDescription: Brakeman is a static analysis tool which checks Ruby on Rails applications for security vulnerabilities.

tools.name: detect-secrets
tools.description: An enterprise friendly way of detecting and preventing secrets in code
tools.longDescription: detect-secrets is an aptly named module for detecting secrets within a code base. It is designed to be used as a pre-commit hook.

tools.name: Checkmarx
tools.description: Enterprise static application security testing platform
tools.longDescription: Checkmarx is an enterprise-grade SAST platform that helps organizations identify and remediate security vulnerabilities in their code.

tools.name: Burp Suite
tools.description: Web security testing platform
tools.longDescription: Burp Suite is a leading range of cybersecurity tools, built for teams, to help organizations test their web applications for vulnerabilities.

tools.name: Cosign
tools.description: Container signing, verification, and storage in an OCI registry
tools.longDescription: Cosign is a tool that makes container signing simple and secure. It is part of the Sigstore project.
